Name: Valheim
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Valheim and run it.

UDP - Game Port Range.Name: UDP - Game Port Range
UDP - Game Port Range.Description: UDP Game Ports (If you need another port delete this Entry and create a new UDP port mapping with the corresponding port range | GAME_PORT +2 | also don't forget to click on show more and change the GAME_PORT)

GAME_ID.Name: GAME_ID
GAME_ID.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container downloads at startup.
If you want to install a static or beta version of the game change the value to: '896660 -beta YOURBRANCH' (without quotes, replace YOURBRANCH with the branch or version you want to install).

GAME_PARAMS.Name: GAME_PARAMS
GAME_PARAMS.Description: Enter your extra start up commands for the server here otherwise leave empty.

Steam-Username.Name: Steam-Username
Steam-Username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Validate Installation.Name: Validate Installation
Validate Installation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Steam-Password.Name: Steam-Password
Steam-Password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Server Password.Name: Server Password
Server Password.Description: Server Password - ATTENTION: the minimum length is 6 characters!

Public Server.Name: Public Server
Public Server.Description: List Server as Public (set to '0' to disable or set to '1' to enable).

Automatically Update Game.Name: Automatically Update Game
Automatically Update Game.Description: If set to 'true' (without quotes) the container will automatically check every 60 minuts if there is an update available and restart the container if a update is found (please keep in mind if you enable the auto update function the container will automatically restart if a newer version is found, set to 'false' without quotes to disable the update check).

ValheimPlus.Name: ValheimPlus
ValheimPlus.Description: If you want to enable ValheimPlus set this variable to 'true' (without quotes). For more help please refer to this site: https://github.com/nxPublic/ValheimPlus

BepInEx for Valheim.Name: BepInEx for Valheim
BepInEx for Valheim.Description: If you want to enable BepInEx for Valheim set this variable to 'true' (without quotes). For more help please refer to this site: https://valheim.thunderstore.io/package/denikson/BepInExPack_Valheim/

Backup.Name: Backup
Backup.Description: Set this value to 'true' (without quotes) to enable the automated backup function from the container, you find the Backups in '.../valheim/Backups/'. Set to 'false' (without quotes) to disable the backup function.

Backup Interval (in minutes).Name: Backup Interval (in minutes)
Backup Interval (in minutes).Description:
The backup interval in minutes (set to 62 minutes because the game automatically saves the database every 30 minutes)
ATTENTION: The first backup will be triggered after the set interval in this variable after the start/restart of the container).

Backups to keep.Name: Backups to keep
Backups to keep.Description: Number of backups to keep (by default set to 24 to keep the last backups of the last 24 hours).

GAME_PORT.Name: GAME_PORT
GAME_PORT.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing (intital GAME_PORT | Dont forget to create create a new UDP port mapping with the corresponding port range and delete the default port range | GAME_PORT +2)

UID.Name: UID
UID.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!

GID.Name: GID
GID.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!

Debug Log Output.Name: Debug Log Output
Debug Log Output.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!

Write Log to File.Name: Write Log to File
Write Log to File.Description:
This will write the log output to a file, by default to 'valheim.log' to the main directory.<br/>
ATTENTION: Keep in mind this option will force Debug Log Output no matter what you choose in the above variable.
